Producer: J. Todd Harris, Paul A. Kaufman, Christina Sibul
Production Co: Particular Crowd, The Kaufman Company, Branded Pictures Entertainment, The Power of Us Entertainment
Rating: PG-13 (Suicide|Drinking|Crude Sexual Material|All Involving Teens|Language|Mature Thematic Content)
Synopsis: Struggling with self-esteem and family issues, a high school student befriends the prettiest girl at school via social media. Facing constant bullying, his popularity soon grows when he devises a crazy plan that gains the attention of the in-crowd.
Title: Butter's Final Meal
